descriptionHTML:
The forecast is beautiful.

Prepare for your day with the most accurate hourly, 5-day, and 10-day forecasts. Stunning Flickr photos match your location, time of day, and current conditions.

Favorite features
- Get all the details: wind, pressure, and chance of precipitation.
- See animated sunrise, sunset, wind, and pressure modules.
- Browse interactive maps: radar, satellite, heat, and snow.
- Track all your favorite cities and destinations!

Helpful tips
- Scroll down for detailed weather information.
- Tap the plus sign to add up to 20 cities.
- Swipe left-to-right to move between locations.
- Submit your photos to Yahoo Weather by joining #projectweather on Flickr.

Tell us what you think
We are committed to building the best mobile experiences and would love to hear your feedback.

Let us know your thoughts here: weather-app-support@yahoo-inc.com

topReviews.reviewText: So when is the desktop version coming out so I can get rid of my weather bug? One of the most visually stunning weather apps on the market today... Thanks YAHOO!
The design of the app is pretty good, I really like the minimalist design. Also the flickr photos for backgrounds is also really nice.
This app has been claiming we're in the midst of a tornado for a few days now. We had a little wind, snow and cold. Nothing close to a tornado. App never seems to know the weather anymore.
One thing. Is it possible to have the option to change the wind speed to mph please developer's????? 5 stars if you enable this 👍
The pictures really make  this app. Wish they were fresh and new all the time!  Frequently shows me yesterday's weather - why would I need that?
It's a great app I've ever had. Pictures are so beautiful and accuracy. I loved it.
Nicely set out,easy to understand one of the best about
topReviews.reviewTitle: will be easy on eye mid summer

topReviews.reviewText: It's the best weather app on Android Market. But recently temperature is not syncing or giving actual degrees and condition for my city, Nairobi. It's thunderstorms outside but in app it shows mostly cloudy, with no mention of shower or thunder. Please fix it. Thanks

It's pretty good. No problems.great read out, love the special effects, rain, lightning it's all good.I wish there was something you can tap to make the map in motion! Or is there? Am I not seeing it? Is there any way you can add that option?
Nice info and awesome picture slide shows... Much better if you can provide live wallpaper, run on background...
I put the same location  In two different places and give me different weather at the same time.

Looks good, works well. Like the custom backgrounds, and the notifications. The ads are not too annoying. Wish you could choose units independently. I would like degC, kts and mB. Other apps have this option.
They are on top of there game here. So many feature all very helpful. Try it out youll be glad you did
This thing is a beauty, very detailed, accurate, comes with radar map too.
Doesn't know where I am a lot of the time.
Since the last update, any of the widgets are not working.. and i hate this. Fix it ASAP.
An Android wear app with ability to flick through different locations would make it a 5 star app.
Doesn't always refresh, need to manually do so.
The error 941 code really made me mad!
Great widget and beats any other weather widget out there!
It keeps you very well updated with what to expect outdoors.
The app is nice, but the problem I meet is that sometimes it does not remember the setting of C degree and backs to F degree as default settings. Please fix it. Thank you.
topReviews.reviewTitle: App does not remember the setting of C degree

topReviews.reviewText: Whether indoors or out the weather app is always at hand. Plus don't ever remove the weather effects, as they give this App something original.
I wanted a weather app for a nice clean weather widget. This apps widget is customizable and looks great the actual app is beautiful and works awesome!
I like it is easy to read and provide all the weather information needed
Needs updated widgets for larger phones. 5x2 widget would give 5 stars.

This is the best looking weather app I use.  One thing that I really want is animated radar imagery like on the iOS version.  I don't understand why you have that feature on the iOS version, but not the Android version.
I like the app, but so far, the "local photos", are only Generic pics of a sky.
Now any where i can check my home weather.
Good but should be able to remove locations not just add them.
Yahoo weather provides lots of info I want and keeps it interesting
Pictures are great,best  all round weather information I have ever seen.
Not accurate.  Maximum and minimum temperatures on today's display still show yesterday's . It is only updated in the afternoon. This gives wrong information at a glance in the morning.
IT'S FAB! I TRAVEL EVERY DAY-SO I NEED TO KNOW WHAT THE WEATHER WILL BE!
Everything you need in so much beauty
Great app. This is_the_ beautiful weather app though I feel like the data isn't accurate compared to TWC.
Good app but I'm dropping a star for pestering me to review it
Best weather widget and app . All that I was looking for. The best!!!
Simple and precise. All of the updates just keep making it better, unlike many other apps out there... (as in Yahoo Mail)... It doesn't use much data in any mode.
Works fine, not intrusive ads and all the info you need
